info.title: Commerce Webservices
info.description: These services manage all of the common commerce functionality, and also include customizations from installed AddOns. The implementing extension is called commercewebservices.

get.summary: Gets a product configuration
get.description: Returns a product configuration, specified by its id. In case this call is done in the context of a logged-in session, the call ensures that the configuration is only returned if the user is authorized to view the configuration

parameters.name: expMode
parameters.description: If this parameter is provided and its value is true, the system tries to execute the request in expert mode (only possible if the current user belongs to group 'sapproductconfigexpmodegroup'

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: If the parameter is provided only the attributes of the requested group are returned. If the parameter is not provided, attributes for all groups are returned.

patch.description: Updates a product configuration. It's possible to send only the changed parts of the configuration, for example a single value change for an attribute. These changes must include their entire path through the configuration (the group they belong to and its parent groups)

parameters.name: expMode
parameters.description: If this parameter is provided and its value is true, the system tries to execute the request in expert mode (only possible if the current user belongs to group 'sapproductconfigexpmodegroup'

get.summary: Gets a product configuration overview
get.description: Gets a configuration overview, a simplified, condensed read-only view on the product configuration. Only the selected attribute values are present here

patch.description: Updates the configuration overview, a simplified, condensed read-only view on the product configuration. Only the selected attribute values are present here

get.summary: Gets prices for a product configuration
get.description: Gets price elements on configuration level and on attribute value level if present. Those price elements include e.g. the configuration base price and the sum of selected options

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Specifies the group for which the value prices are requested. In case not specified, no value prices are returned

get.summary: Gets variants for a product configuration
get.description: Gets variants that match the current configuration attributes

get.summary: Gets districts for a city.
get.description: Gets all districts for a city.

get.summary: Get component data
get.description:
Finds cms components by the specified IDs. When none is provided, this will retrieve all components
The components list will be filtered by the given catalog, product or category restrictions, as well as by the pagination information. The result will be sorted in the specified order.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional sort criterion. No default value.

post.summary: Get components' data by id given in body
post.description: Given a list of component identifiers in body, return cms component data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional sort criterion. No default value.

get.summary: Get component data by id
get.description: Given a component identifier, return cms component data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

get.summary: Get page data with a list of cms content slots
get.description:
Get page data with a list of cms content slots based on pageLabelOrId or code. If none is provided then this will retrieve a Homepage cms content slots.
Content pages can be filtered by pageLabelOrId while the rest of the page types can be filtered by the code.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: If pageType is ProductPage, code should be product code; if pageType is CategoryPage, code should be category code; if pageType is CatalogPage, code should be catalog code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

parameters.name: pageLabelOrId
parameters.description: Page Label or Id; if no page has a label that matches the provided label exactly, try to find pages whose label starts with a section of the provided label. Otherwise, try to find the page by id. Note: URL encoding on the page label should be applied when the label contains special characters

get.summary: Get page data for specific page id with a list of cms content slots
get.description: Given a page identifier, return the page data with a list of cms content slots, each of which contains a list of cms component data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

get.summary: Get all subgroups of a customergroup.
get.description:
Returns all customer groups that are direct subgroups of a customergroup.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of customer group returned in one page.

post.summary: Creates a new customer group.
post.description:
Creates a new customer group that is a direct subgroup of a customergroup.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

get.summary: Get a specific customer group.
get.description:
Returns a customer group with a specific groupId.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

put.summary: Sets members for a user group.
put.description:
Sets members for a user group. The list of existing members is overwritten with a new one.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

patch.summary: Assigns user(s) to a customer group.
patch.description:
Assigns user(s) to a customer group.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

delete.summary: Deletes a user from a customer group.
delete.description:
Deletes user from a customer group.

To try out the methods of the Customer Groups controller, you must authorize a user who belongs to the customermanagergroup.

get.summary: Get a list of product exports.
get.description: Used for product export. Depending on the timestamp parameter, it can return all products or only products modified after the given time.

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog to retrieve products from. The catalog must be provided along with the version.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results returned per page.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: When this parameter is set, only products modified after the given time will be returned. This parameter should be in ISO-8601 format (for example, 2018-01-09T16:28:45+0000).

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The catalog version. The catalog version must be provided along with the catalog.

get.summary: Get a list of orders with status updates.
get.description: Returns the orders that have changed status. Returns only the elements from the current baseSite that have been updated after the provided timestamp.

parameters.name: fields

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Only items newer than the given parameter are retrieved. This parameter should be in ISO-8601 format (for example, 2018-01-09T16:28:45+0000).

post.summary: Generates a token to restore a customer's forgotten password.
post.description: Generates a token in order to restore a customer's forgotten password.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Customer's user id. Customer user id is case insensitive.

post.summary: Verify the decision of the Merchant
post.description:
Verifies the decision of the merchant. 

Note, the Try it out button is not enabled for this method (always returns an error) because the Merchant Callback Controller handles parameters differently, depending on which payment provider is used. For more information about this controller, please refer to the acceleratorocc AddOn documentation on help.hybris.com.

post.summary: Verify the decision of the Merchant for a cart
post.description:
Verifies the decision of the merchant for a specified cart, and stores information of the PaymentSubscriptionResult for the cart. 

Note, the Try it out button is not enabled for this method (always returns an error) because the Merchant Callback Controller handles parameters differently, depending on which payment provider is used. For more information about this controller, please refer to the acceleratorocc AddOn documentation on help.hybris.com.

get.summary: Get order history for the user's organization branch.
get.description: Retrieves order history data for all orders placed by a default organization branch of the user, for a specified base store. The response can display the results across multiple pages, if required.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Serialized filters applied to the query in the following format: ::facetKey1:facetValue1:facetKey2:facetValue2. Correct values for facetKey are 'user' and 'unit'.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results returned per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting method applied to the return results.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filters only certain order statuses. For example, statuses=CANCELLED,CHECKED_VALID would only return orders with status CANCELLED or CHECKED_VALID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

get.description: Returns products added to the express update feed. Returns only elements updated after the provided timestamp. The queue is cleared using a defined cronjob.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Only items newer than the given parameter are retrieved from the queue. This parameter should be in ISO-8601 format.

get.summary: Get a list of products and additional data
get.description: Returns a list of products and additional data, such as available facets, available sorting, and pagination options. It can also include spelling suggestions. To make spelling suggestions work, you need to make sure that "enableSpellCheck" on the SearchQuery is set to "true" (by default, it should already be set to "true"). You also need to have indexed properties configured to be used for spellchecking.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results returned per page.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Serialized query, free text search, facets. The format of a serialized query: freeTextSearch:sort:facetKey1:facetValue1:facetKey2:facetValue2

parameters.name: searchQueryContext
parameters.description: The context to be used in the search query.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting method applied to the return results.

head.summary: Get a header with total number of products.
head.description: In the response header, the "x-total-count" indicates the total number of products satisfying a query.

get.summary: Get textfield configuration
get.description: Returns list of textfield configuration elements.

get.summary: Gets the default product configuration for a complex product
get.description: Returns the default product configuration for a given complex product. This means that a new instance of the configuration runtime object is created that is equipped with the default values from the configuration model. This API always returns the _entire_ group hierarchy, whereas it's capable of both including all attributes or only those for the first group. This is controlled by query attribute provideAllAttributes

parameters.name: configIdTemplate
parameters.description: If this parameter is provided, the template configuration values will be applied to the default configuration

parameters.name: expMode
parameters.description: If this parameter is provided and its value is true, the system tries to execute the request in expert mode (only possible if the current user belongs to group 'sapproductconfigexpmodegroup'

parameters.name: provideAllAttributes
parameters.description: If this parameter is provided and its value is true, attributes for all groups are returned. Otherwise, attributes only for the first group are considered.

get.summary: Get a product reference
get.description: Returns references for a product with a given product code. Reference type specifies which references to return.

parameters.name: referenceType
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of reference types according to enum ProductReferenceTypeEnum. If not specified, all types of product references will be used.

get.summary: Get a product's stock level.
get.description: Returns a product's stock levels sorted by distance from the specified location, which is provided using the free-text "location" parameter, or by using the longitude and latitude parameters. The following two sets of parameters are available: location (required), currentPage (optional), pageSize (optional); or longitude (required), latitude (required), currentPage (optional), pageSize(optional).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results returned per page.

head.summary: Get header with a total number of product's stock levels.
head.description: In the response header, the "x-total-count" indicates the total number of a product's stock levels. The following two sets of parameters are available: location (required); or longitude (required), and latitude (required).

get.summary: Get a product's stock level for a store
get.description: Returns a product's stock level for a particular store (in other words, for a particular point of sale).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

get.summary: Get a list of promotions.
get.description: Returns promotions defined for a current base site. Requests pertaining to promotions have been developed for the previous version of promotions and vouchers and therefore some of them are currently not compatible with the new promotion engine.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: promotionGroup
parameters.description: Only promotions from this group are returned

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Defines what type of promotions should be returned. Values supported for that parameter are:
  • all: All available promotions are returned
  • product: Only product promotions are returned
  • order: Only order promotions are returned

get.description: Returns products and additional data based on the entry group and search query provided. Examples include available facets, available sorting, and pagination options. It can also include spelling suggestions. To disable spelling suggestions "enableSpellCheck" must be set to "FALSE" on the SearchQuery. Default is set to "TRUE". The configuration of indexed properties is required for spellchecking. Any of the products returned can be added to the specific entry group (bundle).

expectedQuantity.description: Quantity which is expected to be returned for this return request entry

ReturnRequestEntry.description: Representation of a return request entry which contains information about the returned product

orderEntryNumber.description: Order entry number of the returned product

quantity.description: Quantity of the product which belongs to the order entry and is requested to be returned

ReturnRequestEntryInput.description: Representation of a return request entry input for an order

orderCode.description: Code of the order which return request is related to

returnRequestEntryInputs.description: Return request entry inputs which contain information about the order entries which are requested to be returned

ReturnRequestEntryInputList.description: Return request input list for the current order.

ReturnRequestList.description: Representation of an Order Return Request List

Review.description: Object contains review details like : rating, alias, headline, comment

SaveCartResult.description: Representation of a Save Cart Result

numberOfDays.description: How frequent replenishment should be activated expressed in days. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=DAILY'.

numberOfWeeks.description: How frequent replenishment should be activated expressed in weeks. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=WEEKLY'.

nthDayOfMonth.description: On which date of month replenishment should be activated. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=MONTHLY'.

recurrencePeriod.description: Replenishment recurrence period. Available values are DAILY, WEEKLY and MONTHLY. DAILY requires 'numberOfDays'. WEEKLY requires 'daysOfWeek' AND 'numberOfWeeks'. MONTHLY requires 'nthDayOfMonth'.

daysOfWeek.description: List of days of week on which replenishment should occur. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=WEEKLY'.

items.description: List of days of week on which replenishment should occur. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=WEEKLY'.

selected.description: Flag stating when Sort is selected

formattedDate.description: Text representation of the date of special opening day

closed.description: Flag stating if special opening day is closed

name.description: Name of the special opening day event

SpecialOpeningDay.description: Representation of a special opening day

SpellingSuggestion.description: Representation of a Spell Checker Suggestion

status.description: Status or severity indicator, can be one of ERROR, WARNING, INFO or SUCCESS

StatusSummary.description: Representation of a status summary, an aggregated view on issues for a specific status or severity. These issues are attached to configurations of products or order entries

isValueRounded.description: Indicate whether Stock level value is rounded

StoreCountList.description: Representation of a Store Count List

StoreFinderSearchPage.description: Representation of a Store finder search page

StoreFinderStockSearchPage.description: Representation of a Store Finder Stock Search Page

createdAt.description: Date and time of ticket creation.

modifiedAt.description: Date and time of last modification.

type.description: Type of associated object: Cart or Order.

modifiedAt.description: Date and time of last modification.

TicketAssociatedObject.description: Object that can be associated with a ticket. The object can be a cart or an order.

code.description: Event code is specific to each event. It is used to identify an event.

author.description: Name of user who created this ticket event.

createdAt.description: Date and time of event creation.

message.example: The drill was damaged when I received it. Could you please send me a replacement?

addedByAgent.description: Whether an agent added this event.

TicketEvent.description: Basic information about the ticket event.

filename.description: The name and the extension of the attached file.

TicketEventAttachment.description: Object containing a set of fields for ticket attachment.

message.example: The drill was damaged when I received it. Could you please send me a replacement?

hour.description: Hour part of the time data

minute.description: Minute part of the time data

activationTime.description: The time the trigger will be activated

displayTimeTable.description: Description of when the trigger is being activated

defaultPointOfServiceName.description: Name of the default pick up location

selected.description: Boolean flag of whether the user is selected

active.description: Boolean flag of whether the user is active/enabled or not

UserGroup.description: User group object with id and name.

UserGroupList.description: Representation of an User Group List

uid.description: user id, unique string required to create new user. It can be email

hasImage.description: Flag if varian category has image assigned

elements.description: List of elements with the type of variant matrix element

VariantMatrixElement.description: Representation of a Variant Matrix Element

url.description: Url address of the variant option

VariantOptionQualifier.description: Representation of a Variant Option Qualifier

name.description: Name of the variant value category

sequence.description: Sequence number of variant value category

superCategories.description: Parent category of variant value category

VariantValueCategory.description: Representation of a Variant Value Category

code.description: The identifier of the Voucher. This is the first part of voucher code which holds first 3 letters, like: 123

voucherCode.description: Voucher code, is the holder for keeping specific occasional voucher related to business usage. It can be generated and looks like: 123-H8BC-Y3D5-34AL

value.description: Value of the voucher. Example of such value is: 15.0d

valueString.description: The value of the voucher to display. Example: 15.0%

freeShipping.description: Specifies if the order this voucher is applied to is shipped for free (true) or not (false). Defaults to false.

weekDay.description: Text representation of week day opening day

closed.description: Flag stating if weekday opening day is closed

WeekdayOpeningDay.description: Representation of a Weekday Opening Day

trackingUrl.description: The tracking url provided by the carrier

messages.description: the messages list of this conversation

pageSize.description: The number of results per page. A page may have less results if there are less than a full page of results, only on the last page in the results

currentPage.description: The current page number. The first page is number zero (0), the second page is number one (1), and so on

totalPages.description: The total number of pages. This is the number of pages, each of pageSize, required to display the totalResults.

totalResults.description: The total number of matched results across all pages

deprecatedPagination.description: Representation of a search results pagination

reason.description: Additional classification specific for each error type e.g. 'noStock'.

subjectType.description: Type of the object related to the error e.g. 'entry'.

subject.description: Identifier of the related object e.g. '1'.

value.description: the corresponding value of current channel, for example, for SMS it should be a mobile number; for email it should be an email address

enabled.description: if true, the channel is on; if false, the channel is off

visible.description: if true, the channel is visible; if false, the channel is invisible

count.description: Number of elements on this page

hasNext.description: Indicates if there is next page

hasPrevious.description: Indicates if there is previous page

notificationType.description: notification type used for this message

selected.description: Flag stating when Sort is selected
